headline: Will THG Nutrition’s Plex Cloud Win Shape Rockwell Automation’s (ROK) Software-Led Growth Narrative?
summary: In January 2026, THG Nutrition, part of THG PLC and home to the Myprotein brand, announced it had selected Rockwell Automation’s Plex cloud-based Manufacturing Execution System to modernize and unify production across its global nutrition manufacturing sites, starting with its large Warrington facility in the UK. The move highlights growing demand for configurable, no-code industrial software that delivers real-time visibility, standardized processes, and lower IT complexity for...

headline: Building a More Resilient, Agile, and Sustainable Future
summary: NORTHAMPTON, MA / ACCESS Newswire / January 15, 2026 / The Rockwell Automation 2025 Sustainability Report showcases how the company is bringing together technology and manufacturing for a more sustainable tomorrow. "As both a manufacturer and a trusted ...
